md2richtext.title: Markdown to Rich Text Converter
md2richtext.instruction1: Edit Markdown text on the left
md2richtext.instruction2: HTML code with inline styles is shown in the top right
md2richtext.instruction3: Actual rendering is shown in the bottom right
md2richtext.instruction4: Customize appearance using Rich Text Settings
md2richtext.instruction5: Click "Copy Rich Text" button to copy styled rich text
md2richtext.instruction6: Click "Copy HTML Code" button to copy HTML code with inline styles
md2richtext.instruction7: Paste into Word, email, or any rich text editor
md2richtext.htmlCodeDescription: This shows the converted HTML code (with inline styles), click the button above to copy
md2richtext.previewDescription: The rich text rendering is shown above, click "Copy Rich Text" to copy this content as rich text
